original_title: Je Suis A Stand-up – Eddie Izzard Abroad
overview: BBC2 documentary of Eddie Izzard's first foray into world touring. Beginning in his "hometown" of Eastbourne and and culminating in his month long show in the East village of New York, Izzard travels to Paris (his first, unsuccessful French language show,) Copenhagen, Reykjavik, and Stockholm.
title: Je Suis A Stand-up – Eddie Izzard Abroad
